blocks.title: Random Verb Recall
instructions: Pick 10 verbs from the past 20 days.
Add one modal sentence and one weil clause.

blocks.title: Filler Integration
instructions: Use filler phrases in real sentences.
Examples: Ehrlich gesagt, Meiner Meinung nach, Soweit ich weiß, Im Grunde genommen.

blocks.title: 5-Minute Monologue
instructions: Pick one topic and speak continuously without stopping.

blocks.title: Verb Clusters
instructions: Use 5 verbs from Days 1–30, 5 from Days 31–60, and 5 from Days 61–90.

blocks.title: Complexity Upgrade
instructions: Force use of weil, obwohl, wenn, and dass in your sentences.

blocks.title: 10-Minute Continuous Speech
instructions: Speak continuously with no stopping and no correction.
